con:interface.name: PAX Protect Reflow Workflow Service API
con:interface.con:description: PAX Protect Reflow Workflow Service API documentation

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Returns all disrupted flights from cache Returns all disrupted flights within a configurable period.

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Returns all disrupted flights within a configurable period under a specified tenant. Returns all disrupted flights within a configurable period under a specified tenant.

con:parameter.con:name: flight-id
con:parameter.con:description: Flight id in the format of CarrierCode-OperationalDate(YYYY-MM-DD)-Origin-Destination-FlightNumber.

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Returns a disrupted flight within a configurable period that matches the flight id specified under a tenant. Returns a disrupted flight within a configurable period that matches the flight id specified under a tenant.

con:method.name: POST
con:method.con:description: Updates connection count for compartments. Updates connection count for compartments.

con:parameter.con:name: Authorization
con:parameter.con:description: Bearer token containing uaa user scope - the authentication for this user

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Clears redis disruption cache. Clears redis disruption cache.

con:parameter.con:name: Authorization
con:parameter.con:description: Bearer token containing uaa user scope - the authentication for this user

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Gets run-time information about this service. Gets run-time information about this service

con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Validates that the service is running and responding to requests. It will also return the last time data was received. Validates that the service is running and responding to requests

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
con:eventHandlers.con:script: def headers = request.requestHeaders headers.clear() request.requestHeaders = headers headers.put( "Authorization", "Basic YXZpYXRpb25faW5fcHByb191YWFfcWE6NGZKSUpUcXlVRnhLOVNOZw==" ) headers.put( "Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ) headers.put( "Predix-Zone-Id", "a8a2ffc4-b04e-4ec1-bfed-7a51dd408725" ) request.requestHeaders = headers

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
